Text: your digitsBill Been thinking of you a lot lately I hope that you are well in light of all of the enron news I wanted to send you something via US mail I know that you bought a house about years ago but I dont have your coordinates Can you send them along Thanks Bill Mark

RE your digitsBill Great to hear from you To be sure its jazz not classical Ive still got some growing to do I think of you every time I put on The Essential Stan Getz sp Great recommendation Ive bought some Nina Simone lately most recently Best Of and Blues I did see Run Lola Run great movie Havent been going to the movies a lot lately bc of Alex my new son Its a fair trade though Ill pick up Momento next time Im at Blockbuster and check out the classical discs you recommended Work is good Im not sure if you know what we do we buy people out of their lp interests before the term of the partnership Esentially providing liquidity to an otherwise illiquid market Theres a lot of crap on the market these days but every now and then you get someone selling good interest too Its mentally stimulating and professionally accretive so Im very happy Thanks again for the referral that was very helpful in making it all happen Well Ill scan my recent disc purchases to see if theres any other buys I think you ought to put on your list All the best Mark Original Message From Rapp Bill mailtoBill NRONcom Sent Thursday November PM To Mark Maruszewski Subject RE your digits Mark Great to hear from you The last few weeks have definitely been a difficult period I still cant believe it Im doing fine and actually think that things areb eginning to stabilize So hows the baby doing And how are you doing John W called about a week ago and said he thought you were doing well and seemed to be enjoying your new job I guess its not so new anymore You definitely made the right decision to leaveS tratum As youve probably heard they havent been able to raise any money and now plan to liquidate I think theyre down to four or five people in New York and about the same number in Houston My address is as follows Camelot Lane Houston Texas Again its really good to hear from you Best wishes Oh yeah in case you havent already seen the following movies I highly recommend them Run Lola Run German with English subtitles and Memento American both are available on videotape Also if I remember correctly you like classical music so you mighte njoy Murray Perahias sp recording of Bachs Goldberg Variations Take care Original Message From Mark Maruszewski mailto Sent Thursday November PM To Subject your digits Bill Been thinking of you a lot lately I hope that you are well in light of all of the enron news I wanted to send you something via US mail I know that you bought a house about years ago but I dont have your coordinates Can you send them along Thanks Bill Mark This email is the property of Enron Corp andor its relevant affiliate and may contain confidential and privileged material for the sole use of the intended recipient s Any review use distribution or disclosure by others is strictly prohibited If you are not the intended recipient or authorized to receive for the recipient please contact the sender or reply to Enron Corp at and delete all copies of the message This email and any attachments hereto are not intended to be an offer or an acceptance and do not create or evidence a binding and enforceable contract between Enron Corp or any of its affiliates and the intended recipient or any other party and may not be relied on by anyone as the basis of a contract by estoppel or otherwise Thank you
